title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the AR shopping assistant, including features, user stories, and technical constraints.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AR component, backend services, data storage, and integrations with third-party services (e.g., product catalogs, reviews, recommendations). Consider scalability, performance, security, maintainability, and modular design aspects. Provide detailed documentation and diagrams to communicate the architecture to stakeholders.

title: Develop AR User Interface
description: Implement the augmented reality user interface for overlaying product information and recommendations.

title: Build Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for retrieving product data, processing recommendations, and integrating with store systems.

title: Set up Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for product information, user profiles, and recommendations.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to security and privacy best practices, including data encryption, access controls, and user consent.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application to various environments.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create detailed technical documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users.
